gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 112, Heat 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Heat, 112-97. Mikal Bridges led all scorers with 24 points and six rebounds for the Nets, while Cameron Johnson added 19 points, 10 rebounds, and five assists in the victory. Jaime Jaquez Jr. tallied 18 points, five rebounds, and four assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 7-8 on the season, while the Heat fall to 10-7.
